name: Submerged (itch) (Kim Chaves, annikamaia)
description:
Navigate the ancient underwater ruins to discover the secret behind the civilization that once lived there.

Submission for the 11th Alakajam.

A tip for you: pressing R resets the stage. Use it well.

Known bugs:

Your character get stuck in the moving plataforms sometimes. Also, they don't seem to quite know how to ride one yet. Plataforms are tricky like that.

Your jellyfish friend may or may not dissappear on the second stage... Well, maybe it needed some time alone, how about that? Yeah, let's leave it at that.
